      static java.lang.String get(java.lang.String term, java.lang.String xpath, java.lang.String allowed_symbols)
      Escapes <, > and & characters, as well as @"{}()=$~+ (search query operators) in the given term for inclusion into the search query.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public static java.lang.String get(java.lang.String term,
                                   java.lang.String xpath,
                                   java.lang.String allowed_symbols)
        Escapes <, > and & characters, as well as @"{}()=$~+ (search query operators) in the given term for inclusion into the search query. Also wraps the term in XML tags if xpath is specified.
        Parameters:
        term - the term to be escaped (e.g. a search query term)
        xpath - an optional xpath, to be specified if the search term is to be searched under a specific xpath
        allowed_symbols - a string containing operator symbols that the user is allowed to use (e.g. ")
        See Also:
        CPSTerm
